name: fecklessly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is weak in character and lacks determination: He had been lying around fecklessly at home for days. The manager was furious and said that the team's performance had been fecklessly inept.
More examplesFewer examplesIt was a source of great disappointment to her parents that she had fecklessly failed to use her talent.He said that he could repair the car, but he just fecklessly fiddled with the engine.The head teacher was dismayed by how fecklessly the students had been behaving.
